Description: Net-sinker made of grey-brown steatite, flat elongated shape, rectangular in section, square ends. Four grooves incised, one at one end that is circumferential and partly cut in two lines, two parallel lines at the other end that are both only visible on 2 sides and one groove in the middle of the object that is visible on the two wider sides. The end with the two grooves is partly chipped off. The surface is partly well smoothed and polished, partly uneven.
